friends.name: Rahul Kamal
friends.quote: He was a charming guy, we used to finish his tiffin in less than 3 sec 😆🍱

friends.name: Pratyush
friends.quote: My best friend, to save my ass he took blame on his head 🤝🔥

friends.name: Subhashree
friends.quote: Only girl who matched my frequency back then 📻💫

friends.name: Shradha
friends.quote: Every class has that one girl selected for assembly prayers or function day singing, she was the one 🎤🎶

friends.name: Subrat Malla
friends.quote: The artist of the class, he could draw epic things with no sweat ✏️🎨

friends.name: Swaraj, Swadhin
friends.quote: The Non-Identical twins, good memories and the same enemy 🤜🤛😆

friends.name: Srijan
friends.quote: He was intelligent and hardworking, unlike me 😂📚

friends.name: Om, Arihant
friends.quote: Always came prepared before exams, still acts like they knew nothing 📖😏

friends.name: Amar
friends.quote: Always chill, always late, has his priorities straight – taking classes is not one of them 😆📆

friends.name: Arfam, Aditya
friends.quote: Like soda and mentos – explosive together! 🧨🥤

friends.name: Ashu Bhai
friends.quote: Informer of our group, from spicy stories to event leaks 🔥📢

friends.name: Vedika, Angali, Omika, Riya, Devika
friends.quote: This list is big. I cannot use their names separately – my safety concern 😅🚨
